long_description: Arm yourself with the powerful Inova T3R(TM) rechargeable flashlight for use at home, on the road or in the mountains. It's 234-lumen beam turns night to day. High-powered LED outputs 234 lumens and throws a beam up to 152m (499 ft.) on high to illuminate dark trails; switch to low to output 20 lumens and conserve battery power. Use the included cable to recharge the lithium ion battery from any standard USB output found on many computers and solar panels (sold separately). Flashlight includes AC and DC adapters so you can charge the battery from a household outlet or vehicle power port; it takes approximately 4 hrs. to fully charge the battery. Battery provides up to 2 hrs. 45 min. of use on high and 40 hrs. on low. 3-position end-cap switch activates constant and momentary high and low settings and the strobe setting; use the strobe setting for signaling. Regulated output maintains consistent light output over the lifetime of the batteries. Aerospace-grade aluminum body with anodized finish stands up to regular use in the outdoors; aggressive knurling provides a positive grip. Inova T3R rechargeable flashlight provides IPX4 water resistance for reliability in inclement weather. Includes a lanyard.
short_description: Arm yourself with the powerful Inova T3R(TM) rechargeable flashlight for use at home, on the road or in the mountains. It's 234-lumen beam turns night to day.
